definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Hard, wiry and straight, lying close to the body with a definite undercoat.
sentences.chinese: 剛毛，毛質硬且直，緊貼身體，有一定的底毛。

sentences.english: Prices for synthetic bristles haven't changed much all these years.
sentences.chinese: 價格爲綜合性的剛毛沒有整這些數年多改變。

sentences.english: The texture is of medium harshness , not silky or wiry. Wavy or curly hair is a fault.
sentences.chinese: 毛髮質地爲中等粗硬，不應該呈絲狀或剛毛狀。

sentences.english: The setae on abdomen, both dorsal and ventral are longer and more in number.
sentences.chinese: 腹部背面及腹面的剛毛均比模式種的長而多。

sentences.english: Their thick hide sports sparse bristles and sensory hairs.
sentences.chinese: 它們厚實的象皮長有剛毛和敏感的毛髮。

sentences.english: Pedicel ca. 13 cm at fruiting, only apically sparsely setose.
sentences.chinese: 花梗果時長約13釐米，僅於先端硫被剛毛。

sentences.english: Large deciduous tree of the pacific coast having deeply parted bristle-tipped leaves.
sentences.chinese: 太平洋沿岸高大的落葉樹，葉深裂，具剛毛尖頭。

sentences.english: I come to hear about your offer for bristles .
sentences.chinese: 我來爲剛毛有關你的提議。

sentences.english: Young branch is mixed closely by hoar short fluff the long bristle of extend.
sentences.chinese: 幼枝密被灰白色短柔毛和伸展的長剛毛。
